import React from 'react' import './ScoreBoard.css' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' function ScoreBoard() { const {mark}=useParams() console.log(mark); return (

SCORE BOARD

Total Question : 10

Total Score : 10

Gained Score : {mark}

) } export default ScoreBoard
